archimate:Product.name: InfraNodus
archimate:Product.documentation:
InfraNodus: an online graph tool to visualizes any text as a network. It shows you the most relevant topics, terms and their relations to one another. InfraNodus is an open-source tool is developed by Nodus Labs.
Open source version without support, with code at Github (https://github.com/noduslabs/infranodus) , a Cloud version (9Euros/month) and an Enteprise Version (70Euros/month)
at https://infranodus.com/
Replace Textexture
